website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced soaker hose made of high-quality rubber for durability.
pros: Should give you a nice, even water distribution throughout the length of the hose, as long as the end caps are tight
7-year warranty outpaces most soaker hoses in this price range
cons: Doesn't fold down flat for storage
Hose may leak around connector area

customer_reviews.title: Eh, lasted two summers
customer_reviews.text: It is the beginning of the third summer irrigation season with this hose. Pulled it out of storage, hooked it up to test it, and it blow out in three places. I purchased this soaker hose the same time I purchased two others flat soakers. They are working great. This one can't handle the sun and broke down causing the unrepairable blow outs. I'd consider other hoses if you want one to last longer than two seasons.
customer_reviews.author: bilran

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I stretched out the hose in the sun and it straightened right out--no kinks. The connector to the hose was nice and secure. The hose walls are quite thick. Note...of course, if you turn on your faucet to high pressure, you could bust it, but that isn't the purpose of a soaker hose. You turn it on at a low pressure or use the flow restriction washer that comes with the product. Bottom line, I am very please and just ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Now, admittedly I bought this last May and did not go to set it up until today. It had been rolled up in its packing so long that it broke where it was an extra tight bend. I thought, well OK, I will repair it by making a clean cut at the break and installing a new female end. Got it all installed, hooked it up to the hydrant and unwound the hose. Believe it or not, it broke again just below the repair. The entire hose is rotten. I decided to replace it with a flat fabric hose.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love the soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: I love the soaker hose. It will emit the same amount of water at the supply hose connection as the end of the soaker hose. I had some new sod replace some old sod. It evenly soaked the new sod which was 20' x 8". I am very happy with my purchase. Remember, there is a 7 year warranty! I have no problems and look forward to using it again when needed. I am thinking about circling some of my trees with the soaker hose and give them a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great....for two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I have had soaker hoses for many years and most failed after one or two seasons. I researched many hoses for this purchase and this one was more expensive but seemed to be higher quality with a warranty. I carefully laid it out in the garden without kinks and away from all foot traffic. It worked well for two weeks. Several days ago I turned it on to discover a1/4 inch crack and massive leak rendering the hose useless. I typed in the email link for the warranty and it does not exist. I then tried to contact the company and thus far have gotten no response. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Rocky Mountain 25ft Soaker hose. Returning. Split within 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: From reading many reviews on many hoses, soaker hoses seem prone to splitting. I've never had one before. This hose had good reviews. A big split developed on first use. Package instructions say do not return to Amazon, return to manufacturer. So I don't know how that's going to work. I'm guessing manufacturer replaces it instead of Amazon refunding upon return. I wanted to review before returning in case I can't review after returning. I will update on return process if I'm able to edit.
customer_reviews.author: NancyJ

customer_reviews.title: Great soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: I got the 5/8" soaker hose in 25 ft. It works great except that I wish they had one in between 25-50 feet. It's better not to turn the water pressure up too much because it is not good for the hose-let it run slow to medium for a few hours when watering a large tree. The only down side is picking it up to put it away-it's a muddy mess unless you leave it to dry out before trying to coil it up. A longer one would be even worse. The 7 year warranty is nice. So far I have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry W.

customer_reviews.title: Great soaker hose.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the negative reviews on the Miracle Grow soaker hoses I was rather discouraged. I thought I'd spend a few more dollars and give the Rocky Mountain soaker hose a try. Very happy with this hose. I've used this a few times now to water a string of holly bushes I just planted. I have a connected to a 100ft, 7/16" diameter hose. I'm guessing the GPM on the hose is around 3-4gal/min. Hose works perfect. Consistent water flow end to end. Very happy with that as I was expecting I might need higher GPM (5-7) in order to get a good feed. Great little hose. Seems very durable too. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: Quality Soaker Hose
customer_reviews.text: This hose works very well and seems to be of a higher quality than others we have had. I think this is the hose we will use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Misses the function part
customer_reviews.text: Reviews indicate this is a product that is superior to others on the market. That said all the products out there must be mediocre. The water output is not good, Thus the benefit of flexibility, light weight and maneuverability are of no consequence. It if doesn't apply water properly then what do these other properties have to do with it. Most of the holes are plugged or not properly cleaned out so water can flow smoothly. Good idea but falls short on performance. Of course it saves water. None can get out of the hose.
customer_reviews.author: review4you2

customer_reviews.title: Soaker hose that works!
customer_reviews.text: I use this soaker hose in my raised garden. I am very thankful to be able to thoroughly soak the garden bed by use of this hose. The attachment to my hoses are flawless. I've used different intensities of flow from our house....the hose worked just fine. I did leave it out in the sun to straighten out.....for an afternoon! No complaints - nice to have a 7 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: rksezate

customer_reviews.title: A good product although it sprung (a split in the hose) ...
customer_reviews.text: A good product although it sprung (a split in the hose) a leak early on. I wrapper some electrician's tape around the leak and have had no more difficulties. It is preforming beautifully. It might be well to include a flow restricting washer with the hose so the water pressure isn't too high.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Good soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: It is a good soaker hose...lots of little holes and does well on a low flow... My husband has been using it on the side of the house where he didn't want too much water, but enough to water the few plants on that side. It's good. Haven't been using it as long...but better than what was available at the hardware store (he went to two)....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Hosed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after a similar soaker, also bought on amazon, broke in half after 3 light-duty uses. This soaker hose seemed identical to the first on. On the very second use of this soaker the hose sprung a leak that produced a stream out of the side of the hose that seemed to be about the diameter of a pencil. I returned the hose in the original packaging. I also bought a cast iron circular spot sprinkler that works flawlessly with the requirement to be periodically moved from place to place that you want soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Bill P.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have purchased many soaker hoses from the big box stores and can report that this hose was several times better than any I had purchased previously. It arrived very quickly but most importantly I was impressed with the construction, especially the fittings which were very high-quality (when compared to the eight other hoses). I installed it in my raised garden watering system and the plants have thrived. Highly recommend this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Walter B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far they are working very well. This is my second season with 3if them and I have 3 more of them around new trees and bushes. No complaints at all! Used them last year, too, and left them around trees all winter (PNW) and they are fine. Perfectly happy with them and can recommend. I turn the hose on a little ways until I see them start to drip and then turn it back to almost a closed position to get a slow drip so I can soak for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Constance M.

customer_reviews.title: Split on third use
customer_reviews.text: The hose really appears to be well made and it worked great for the first two uses. However on the third use it split and became unusable. I returned the hose and did not order a replacement. In all fairness I would have ordered another but I needed one asap and bought one of a different brand at my local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Spicher

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience
customer_reviews.text: First time I connected this hose to soak the garden it blew out. I decided that I would repair this hose -- had to be a fluke. It blew out immediately again, this time in the middle of the hose. I repaired again, making two hoses. I hooked it up and it lasted about 10 minutes and it blew again. Not a good experience with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Livingston

customer_reviews.title: first of I love the name Rocky Mountain
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have purchased many soaker hoses... but I decided to try one more time and ordered from Rocky Mountains Goods soaker hose...first of I love the name Rocky Mountain... I was born in the .rocky Mountains of Canada! But down to business.. these soaker hoses have much more heft to them... I have a long ridge of Lanatana and this hose feeds it all the way, beginning to end...nice to see... Great product... very durable...
customer_reviews.author: J. REED

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Overall, not a bad product, but with usual water pressure the beginning of the hose sees a lot more water than the end of the hose. We found a work around by connecting the water source to both the front end and the back end of the hose through a Y-adapter. The hose kit should come with an option for this, as 50' is a long system to lose water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Genda

customer_reviews.title: I  bought 5 and chose this brand and type, because of the warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know the durability yet. But they work well, although getting them laid out, was tricky. I bought 4 at first. But because my yard goes up on on one end, and we don't have the best water pressure , especially when it's over 100 F, I ended up buying a 5 th hose,nd d running a regular hose to one of them. Now everything works great. Connectors are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dollymop22

customer_reviews.title: Drought
customer_reviews.text: I installed 20 new Arborvitae trees (6'+) for a hedge and installed soaker hose around the bases of the trees in the middle of this drought(2019) I was able to economically keep them all watered and they have thrived. I didn't lose one of them! I'm going to order 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Al

customer_reviews.title: Great soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: Nice soaker hose. Replaced a 50’ Miracle Gro hose with this 25’ unit. Has significantly better output than our previous hose, enough so that we don’t need the additional length. Distribution is more even and consistent. Overall quite pleased. Will ammend my review if there are any issues at the end of the season.
customer_reviews.author: RCBoston

customer_reviews.title: wide hose with good flow
customer_reviews.text: This soaker hose is a very good quality, with a large lumen, so puts out a good amount of water in a shorter time, just where you want it. We had to stake it in place for the first couple of days, just to help it uncoil a bit, but stays in place without stakes now. Good buy, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these hoses, despite other reviews that claimed the product was susceptible to leaks. My thinking was that at least two of them would perform. I lost my bet. The first one split a two inch gash within a week of installation. I patched it, and two weeks later, it split another one inch gash a foot away from original leak. Last week, a second hose split a one inch gash. Waiting for the last one to fail. All hoses were on separate lines, coming from a four-hose carburetor attached to the main hose.
customer_reviews.author: Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Durable, with a 7 year Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Rocky Mountain Soaker Hose(s) in 25 & 50 feet to stretch along my existing and desperately in need of water redwood trees. I’m happy to report that the trees are thriving. I run the hose every three days for a couple hours. I saturates the ground around my trees nicely. It runs all the way down the hose in less than a minute and waters evenly. I would recommend this product. It’s worth it, and much better quality than a little Miracle Grow hose I purchased at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: christy copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soaker hose!
customer_reviews.text: Talking about a great soaker hose -- this one is the best I have ever used. solid construction. Easily used. I plan to order additional ones to replace the ones that only last a year (if that long!). These have a 7 year warranty and I expect them to last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Superior Soaker Hose!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic soaker hose. I threw away the ones we had from last year, they were flat, and just did not do the job. The Rocky Mountain hose however, stays round-shaped, and the water squirts out of it through numerous small holes which are very evenly placed, so it saturates much better. I highly recommend this for your next soaker hose. I definitely will be buying them again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: This is great that it is a family owned company. I don't know what is warranted, but I really like the 25' length. The longer ones are more difficult to use and crimp. For large trees, I put it on one side of the tree at where the drip line should be, then I do the other side.
customer_reviews.author: lauren carey

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Had Gotten a Few More
customer_reviews.text: This hose seems to be just right for our many youngish shrubs planted in bark dust throughout the front yard. We have a hot, dry summer, so we've been giving them a decent soak a couple times a week. I bought the hose for my gardener husband, and he's been surprised how well it works and how much he likes it. I got the 25 foot hose thinking it seemed like plenty, but he mentioned wishing he had more to cover more yard shrubs, in addition to veggie garden. Would be great to have some quick hose disconnects along with these. The quality seems really good, and the shipment came quickly with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: A product that does what it is suppose to do!
customer_reviews.text: I paid a lot of $ to have my back beds landscaped. My previos problem was not watering enough. It took a lot of time and effort to endure during the triple digits of summer. My friend, retired landscaper, told me about this and recommended it. So I purchased two of your hoses and set it up and walked away. I turn on very low pressure and it immediately produces drips of water from start to end. So far....so good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Webb

customer_reviews.title: Solid reliable soaker hose.
customer_reviews.text: The metal hose connector are very solid. I want to get another one so I can auto water the other side of the Boxwood hedge. The hose should be just dripping water not spraying. I recommend using a gate valve to choke the flow down so you don't blow the hose out.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Turned into a sprinkler upon sixth use
customer_reviews.text: I only got to use this six times before it broke. During the second use, I noticed that there was a small arc of water coming out of the top of the hose while the rest was dripping as it was supposed to do. No big deal. Each time I used it, the stream of water got bigger. By the sixth use, water wasn't even going to the end of the hose and the small stream now looked like a sprinkler! What a huge disappointment! Save your money and buy a different soaker hose.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Soaker Hose Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A soaker hose that isn't as thin as a spaghetti noodle! This is a hefty diameter like the soakers I bought years ago but have been unable to find since. I really don't know why my local stores don't carry this larger diameter style anymore. Excellent water flow all the way to the end of the hose. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nisarella

customer_reviews.title: OK so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every soaker hose I could find. The ones sold by the local hardware store leaked immediately where the hose attached. Other so-called premium ones didn't distribute the water evenly down the length to the end. These have a different way of attaching the soaker hose part to the fitting to attach to the water hose. Let's hope for the best!
customer_reviews.author: D. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: I needed a soaker hose to water berry bushes. The Rocky Mountain Goods Soaker Hose performs excellently. It delivers water at a good pressure without wasting water or rupturing. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bandi

customer_reviews.title: Yard saver in high heat
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. In our HOT south Texas weather....... It gives direct penetrating moisture to tough spots to keep them alive and growing. A must use in dry not weather.essential for any southern yards or flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: jane swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought many soaker hoses and have had to replace them often, but this soaker hose won't have to be replaced anytime soon. Great construction and material is heavy duty, although the hose is not heavy. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: BEST SOAKER HOSE I HAVE TRIED
customer_reviews.text: Love this soaker hose. It delivers the most water to plant beds and does not kink & cut off the water supply to plants when wrapped around the base of large trees & shrubs. So much better than competitors' brands I have tried. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C.

customer_reviews.title: Pours water out of a crack
customer_reviews.text: After using it for less than a week. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality with a twist: KINKY
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a high quality hose with brass fittings. Comes with the rubber washer. Thicker than my other soaker hoses. My only caveat was that it developed kinks during the unraveling process. Maybe just my method. I did my best to mitigate them.
customer_reviews.author: SMaz

customer_reviews.title: split after TWO uses
customer_reviews.text: The hose is laid in my garden in gradual bends, about 3 times larger than the original packaging. There is a pressure reducer on this line, set to 25 psi. This hose got a 2" long split after TWO uses. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pientka

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time around
customer_reviews.text: Liked the first one that I got so musch I bought another. I can run this for hours and it deep soaks the garden using so much less water. None of my water is blowing away and much less is evaporating.
customer_reviews.author: Notypst

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was about the 4th soaker hose I have bought, the first 3 were from Home Depot. I returned the first. The second worked pretty well, the 3rd the water only went to half the hose and stopped. I went on Amazon and found the Rocky Mountain Soaker hose. It works great. Not only does the water travel to the end of the hose, there is a generous amount of water that comes out through out the hose. I have recommended this to friends already.
customer_reviews.author: Pblowrie

customer_reviews.title: TOP QUALITY! 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with the quality and fast shipping. Our Spring project came to a grinding halt when our local gardening store sold out of the 5/8ths soaker hose. After reading all the reviews, we made our selection. We now have a better quality hose for less money and supporting small business owners set up with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised will buy more.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Seems to be excellent quality except for missing part on one. Bought two one came without end cap. Tried to reach mfgs, no response Amazon solution was to return it and order a new one. They did credit me $ 5.00 very generous. I bought a cap for a buck.
customer_reviews.author: ray hoffer

customer_reviews.title: Must not be twisted!
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to be careful, but one time as I disconnected the hose I twisted the hose material rather than the metal connector and created a hole in the hose. I was able to repair it, happily. Because any twist or kink will damage the hose, I decided to just set it up once and leaving it in the same position. Works well now.
customer_reviews.author: Briony Patterson

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed that 2 of the 3 hoses we purchased have ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed that 2 of the 3 hoses we purchased have broken already. We waited for a hot day to unroll them, stretch them out, and run water through them so they would be more pliable before using them in our garden. One of the hoses broken in half moving it into position. The 2nd hose burst a large tear after using it only twice. So much for "heavy duty." I certainly hope a refund is possible from the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Mother Hen

customer_reviews.title: It does not kink...
customer_reviews.text: Our neighbor actually had one of these hoses first, and he loves his, so we decided to just try one........it is without a doubt the best hose we have ever owned. Doesn’t kind up, easy to move....well worth it. We are probably ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: arlene

customer_reviews.title: Blew a hole in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Used for less than a month, watering a few minutes a day at normal pressure, and it didn't just leak a little, it blew a huge hole. This happened while I was away, so water spewed into my yard. Lots of mess. Lots of water wasted. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorOfRock

customer_reviews.title: Waters evenly but got pinhole leaks after 60 days
customer_reviews.text: Seems like great quality and waters more evenly than hoses I've had in the past but I bought two hoses and they both have small leaks after only 2 months. Those leaks are getting the leaves wet every day and causing some of my garden to rot. Now I will need to go through the hassle of a return . The biggest issue is going to be getting it out of the garden without hurting the plants then running a new hose. It's soon bad because I thought if I bought the more expensive one I would be all set !!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great hose
customer_reviews.text: This is the best soaker hose I have purchased in the last 20 years of gardening. It needs to be laid in the sun to make it flexible for your hose run. Once it is laid out while hot it will take the shape of the hose run you want, very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews4U

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty heavy duty. Claim aside, the water is not evenly distributed throughout the length of the hose. The tomatoes need more water anyway, so this works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: MarkD

customer_reviews.title: Split after one month
customer_reviews.text: I received this soaker hose on May 29, but didn't begin to use it for a week, maybe more. It split on June 30, and was spraying water everywhere. This isn't what you'd expect with a seven year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphie

customer_reviews.title: Best yet
customer_reviews.text: There are so many iterations of recycled rubber soaker hoses,but this one is a top notch product. It's more durable than many I have had for over a decade; it "bleeds" really well even though the hose feels thicker than others and has quality metal crimped ends.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Watering made easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this hose so much, I bought two. After one of them sprung a leak in the 2nd week, they refunded immediately without any hassle. Bought another one and probably will purchase a third one. Makes gardening so much easier. Can only highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gimpy

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for convenience in watering bare spots in my lawn. I have treated it with care as it will kink if you don’t. It’s very heavy duty and should last for years. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a soaker hose from HD. It soaked 10' of the 50' length - I took it back just to complain about it. This soaker hose I purchased from Rocky Mountain Goods is definitely more heavy duty and as a result, it soaks evenly the full 50'. Don't waste your time on a cheaper soaker hose.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Love this hose
customer_reviews.text: Love this hose. It is very sturdy. Material is different from the ones I had before. I keeps the same pressure from the beginning to the end of the hose. I would buy this product again. Very good quality. Highly recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Uneven flow distribution; ruptures under normal pressure;
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this hose for three reasons: 1. The hose does not distribute water evenly. If the pressure is increased enough to get reasonable flow at the far end, the supply end drips excessively. 2. The hose frequently ruptures under normal pressure, especially if the hose is bent any at all. Furthermore, the hose easily kinks and forms a weak spot. 3. The metal reinforcement at the female connection is flimsy.

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of the 50' soaker hoses to try. I really wanted a heavy duty hose. I've been very disappointed in what I can find in the store. I got one to try and liked it so much that I got another one!
customer_reviews.author: graham central

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have used soaker hoses for many years and the Rocky Mountain soaker nose is the best. Arrived coiled nicely with no kinks in the coil. Uncoiled very easily, without kinks. Excellent soaking at the end of the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth the extra money? Time will tell...
customer_reviews.text: I've been through a few soaker hoses. What they all had in common is that they were cheaply made and started springing leaks within one season. This one immediately struck me as being of a higher quality than the rest. So far so good. Time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: tango1050

customer_reviews.title: great soaker
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use these right away so I purposely waited until I did to review them. I love them. Very impressed with their function. I really like them. In fact planning on ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Walton

customer_reviews.title: good soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this soaker hose yet, didn't get it until the end of the season, but since I use soaker hoses exclusively in my garden it should work as expected. It is sturdy and of solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: GailK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: I have a soaker hose from another company and it was like wrestling an anaconda getting it in place. The Rocky Mountain Soaker was super easy to work with and is performing wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: KJEx

customer_reviews.title: Company honors warranty
customer_reviews.text: Soaker hose burst and leaked in several places shortly after I started using it. The vendor promptly provided a refund under the warranty, which I commend them for.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good soaker
customer_reviews.text: The product is well-made and has not sprung a leak yet so far which most of our other soakers have. Well the flow does not seem to be equally distributed more water coming outAt the beginning and the middle than at the other end
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Lipka

customer_reviews.title: This is an easy choice. There is a good volume of water
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy choice. There is a good volume of water, but not enough to pool. The hose is thick but flexible enough to wrap around tight places. I recommend this brand for your watering needs.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This heavy duty hose provides an even amount of water distribution!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two and both hoses exhibit a very even amount of water weeping through its length with no place that is spraying out in a stream. The construction is heavy duty and the composition is made well. The connections are made well and not lightweight brass like some hoses are. We would buy this product again from the seller if needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: nwraindrops

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product for a month and there is a blowout in the hose. Luckily it's pointed on the sidewalk, but if you aim it anywhere else the pressure is so strong it will destroy anything in the path. The rest of the hose is not soaking anymore either. Will be asking for a refund or replacement. Update: contacted seller regarding problem, and refund was processed right away. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Had this item less than 2 weeks....bent up badly, split in two places, and the connector to the hose came off. Company won’t refund due to defects....say they are responsible only for delivery issues, not defective product. What do I do with chunks of soaker hose and the hose connection on a shelf?
customer_reviews.author: Dry lawn - still

customer_reviews.title: Good soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: A good soaker hose that works well. I reposition it daily, around our plants. My main gripe is that it takes awhile to unkink.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this hose a short time but so far I really like it. I have a very small garden that I use the soaker hose in and it works very well! We have yet to see how it holds up in AZ weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tigrisness

customer_reviews.title: Split open this spring after one use last fall.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all durable. I bought three different types of soaker hoses. This one is the worst for longevity. Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: In our area we have to frequently soak our foundations. As such, I have a timer on an outdoor faucet and soaker hoses in use year round. Previous hoses bought at local stores tend to last about two years. I am much more pleased with both the larger diameter and heavy gauge of these hoses, as well as how they evenly water. While it has not yet had the test of time, I am pretty sure it can live up to 7 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Failed.
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this soaker hose, I was impressed. However, it split within the first 6 weeks or so. I was careful with water pressure, but it might have helped to include a pressure reducing disc that used to come with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: This soaker hose performs as advertised. It works from end to end with no "dry" areas, just what I was looking for. I hope this hose lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie T. Harris

customer_reviews.title: sprung a leak within 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: first use, it held water for a few minutes so I went inside. Luckily I checked again a just few minutes later to see water spraying everywhere out a hole that had formed in the hose.
customer_reviews.author: C. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: good quality, nice product.
customer_reviews.text: works fine and seems to be very durable. fast shipping. better quality than the other ones I have for about same price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Treat

customer_reviews.title: Only used it a few times but so far it works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it 5 times to deep water some trees and it has worked great for me. I may get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cobalt

customer_reviews.title: Great hose
customer_reviews.text: My first one arrived damaged and I contacted the maker as the sticker stated. I had a response in 2 hours with refund. Fabulous serve and new one works great!
customer_reviews.author: SMK-TX

customer_reviews.title: That it is strong and it waters much better than any other.
customer_reviews.text: We love this soaker hose. It is far better than any other soaker hose the have ever used. I highly recommend this and this comnpany very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Page

customer_reviews.title: Great Soaker Hose
customer_reviews.text: I've used many different brands of soaker hose and the Rocky Mountain Farms brand is by far the best I've used. The metal connections do not leak and so no pressure is lost at the beginning of the hose. The output at the end of the hose is as good as at the beginning for more even watering. My old hose I have to run for 10 to 15 minutes. The Rocky Mountain Farms hose I get the same water output in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST soaker hose I have purchased and I have purchased many over the years. The connections are well made and the whole overall hose is definitely quality. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joan W. Schnibbe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent larger diameter soaker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent soaker hose. Pliable with uniform seeping. I have been looking for a larger diameter soaker hose for a long time. Can't get them in stores.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyJean

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first hose so much, have now purchased 2nd one. I am using these around home foundation. These hose allow more water to come out which means not as much time required in watering. So much better than my older soaking hose!
customer_reviews.author: Jan E.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$$$
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 hoses. One leaks all over and the other one has little water coming out. Waste of $$$$$
customer_reviews.author: chobe

customer_reviews.title: get the 5/8"
customer_reviews.text: I've had smaller diameter soaker hose where the small diameter restricts the even flow through the length of the hose. I like the 5/8" because this is not an issue in the larger diameter
customer_reviews.author: tom havey

customer_reviews.title: This looks like a great product
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great product, well made and exactly what I was looking for. However, IT DID NOT COME WITH AND END CAP in spite of what the product description said, thus the 2 stars. I can't use the thing until I get an end cap for it. Won't buy from this manufacturer again. And yes, I looked everywhere for the end cap, it just wasn't included.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie E Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and in excellent condition. It is made of high quality material and is flexible. Great hose!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Product must be usable as intended.
customer_reviews.text: This product failed within two weeks of purchase. It developed a huge leak. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Z

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but light weight soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't gone through a whole season with this hose yet, it does seem heavier duty than the normal green ones I buy. If it lasts longer, I will probably get a second one for the front yard!
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Good flow
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the hose for a month now and it is preforming admirably. water is flowing evenly through its length. So far so good, would recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BE. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and the hose works grear
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very well made soaker hose with fine quality craftsmanship. The hose works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last one summer.
customer_reviews.text: Hose split, only a couple months after purchase. Manufacturer claims to have a multi year warranty for their product, but when I contact them I get no response.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMe

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: As described, expedient shipping, received in excellent condition, no problems, extremely pleased
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one month
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this hose and didn’t mind paying more, until I spotted a leak today. It was a gusher! I’m going to try to patch it, but I don’t have much hope.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Put in area where it won't be disturbed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would hold up better than others, but I didn't notice any significant difference compared to cheaper ones. Had spots that seemed to spray vs. drip if water pressure wasn't right. Ended up with a hole, although my fault because I had it next to wire tomato cages that stuck it.
customer_reviews.author: lp

customer_reviews.title: Good basic soaker
customer_reviews.text: It soaks stuff. Seems to take a bit to get rolling but does the job at a fair price
customer_reviews.author: J.M. Herrity

product_meta.title: Rocky Mountain Goods Soaker Hose - Heavy duty rubber - Saves 70% water - End cap included for additional hose connect - Great for gardens/flower beds - Reinforced fittings (25-Feet by 5/8-Inch)
product_meta.description: Size:25-Feet by 5/8-InchRocky Mountain Goods Soaker Hose is a heavy duty soaker hose that will save you water and is made to last. Ideal for flower beds or gardens, simply screw your soaker hose on your faucet and immediately start saving up to 70% more water than traditional sprinkling systems. When adding length is needed you can use the reinforced quick connect for adding more soaker hoses. Rocky Mountain Goods Soaker Hose comes with a lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty recycled rubber soaker hose is made to last
Add length when needed - Quick attach reinforced fittings are included and make for easy connect of additional soaker hoses
Works great for gardens and flower beds
Saves up to 70% more water than traditional sprinkling systems
7 Year Warranty - We guarantee our soaker hose for 7 years

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars471 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
